title: Announcement, Fortnum and Mason Spring 1933 Collection, ca. 1933
medium: Color lithograph on heavy white wove paper
signed: In plate with monogram on second sheet, lower right:EMCKK
provenance: possibly Joseph Platt; Roberta Friedman, Westchester, New York; Emily Miller, New York City; 1999: acquired by Museum
description:
Announcement of clothing show.  On cover fold, FORTNUM/AND/MASON, in three dimensional shaded dark green typography, printed over a hand-painted-looking sun and one half of a leaf (elm, beech, chestnut?) in chartreuse which is over printed in dark green, printed sideways, "Spring 1933."  The other half of this leaf is printed in dark green on the under sheet with "Collection" printed sideways in the opposite direction.

Inside, printed on verso of cover fold and on under fold in dark and light green type, in separate type blocks, information on varieties of clothing, available colors, and date of the showing.

tombstone.epitaph:
Announcement, Fortnum and Mason Spring 1933 Collection, ca. 1933. Color lithograph on heavy white wove paper. 
Gift of Emily Miller. 1999-12-2
